rajaya gena yana sanwardhana wadapiliwelath samanga thama pradeshaye sanwardhana katayuthu idiriyata gena yama sandaha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata sahayogaya labadimata thiranaya kala bawa gampaha mahanagara sabhawe nagaradhipathi (eksath jathika paksha) eranga senanayaka mahatha ‘dinamina’ ta pawasiya.pawathina aarthika thaththwaya matha sanwardhana ilakkayan sapura ganimata thawaduratath eksath jathika pakshaye randi sitima prayojanawath nowana bawa penwa dun nagaradhipathiwaraya sanwardhana ilakkayan kara yomuwimata niyatha washayenma wada kala haki parshawayak samanga sambandha wiya yuthu bawada awadharanaya keleya.thama kisiwitekath boruwen, wanchawen wada nokarana bawath, awashya wanne thaman niyojanaya karana pradeshayatath pradeshaye janathawatath awashya karana sanwardhanayak kara piyaman kirima bawath hethema sandahan keleya.thama pradeshaye sanwidhayakawaraya samanga apekshitha aakarayata janathawa wenuwen wada kirima apahasu bawa ki nagaradhipathiwaraya paksha bhedayakin thorawa wada karana thaman wetha rajayen aaradhanayak labunu bawada kiya.nagaradhipathiwaraya washayen thaman athulu pirisa wyapruthi wishala pramanayak kriyathmaka kala bawath eya kese wuwada janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha kerehi thabu wishwasaya nisama thama me thiranaya gath bawada ki eranga senanayaka mahatha thamata me thiranaya gatha yuthuwa thibune yuda jayagrahanaya labagath mohothe bawada sihipath keleya.gampaha maha nagara sabhawe nagaradhipathiwaraya washayen thama me thiranaya ganu labuwe paudgalika labha prayojana kisiwak apekshawen nowana bawa ki ee mahatha janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata sahayogaya labadimata paminiyada kisidu illimak apeksha nokarana bawada hethema wadiduratath prakasha keleya.
